title: 计分板里面money为什么不能变量
author: w2751286180
txt_content:
有没有大神帮帮看看呀
解决一下





image.png
(4.52 KB, 下载次数: 0)




下载附件


2020-5-15 00:47 上传








这个是电卷变量不能用

下载附件

replies.author: one_
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 one_ 于 2020-5-15 00:58 编辑 

装papi了吗
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-605325-1-1.html安装papi后输入以下指令
/papi ecloud download Vault
/papi ecloud download PlayerPoints

点券变量%playerpoints_points%





money变量%vault_eco_balance%

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
如果使用的是 papi 变量的话，那么应该是 

 /papi ecloud download
 /papi ecloud download Vault
/papi reload

%playerpoints_points% 
%vault_eco_balance%

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
https://cowtransfer.com/s/820c721b05bf4a
把这些都下下来
装进
placeholderapi/expansions
即可
装好之后使用指令
/papi reload

replies.author: 龙岩是啊
replies.txt_content: 没有安装PAPI所需变量.输入/papi ecloud download Vault /papi ecloud download PlayerPoints就可以支持金币和点券了.求最佳.

replies.author: w2751286180
replies.txt_content:
